description: To own a computer or smartphone — indeed, to engage with the digital world to any degree — is to be a mark. You can try to block, encrypt and unsubscribe your way out of it, but you may not succeed.
title: How Scam Calls and Messages Took Over Our Everyday Lives

description: For 12 years, the MTV reality series “Catfish” has traveled the U.S., presenting hundreds of intimate snapshots of what can go wrong when the heart mixes with technology.
title: ‘Catfish,’ the TV Show That Predicted America’s Disorienting Digital Future
